韩国瑞山

韩国瑞山市先进精密有限公司

公司介绍：

先进精密有限公司,总公司位于忠清南道瑞山市, 是一家工业工程有限公司。主要事业部门是成套设备制造,直升飞机制造,风力船制造等。成套设备部门主生产,PHC管, 电线杆, 驼峰管等 混凝土产品等,成套设备, 并直接制造这些混凝土机器设备, 制造各种机械设施设计,制作,安全,运营等。

目前正在进行生产 直升飞机和特殊船舶设计和制作事业,  直升飞机来说2人座轻型直升飞机,和无人机, 对于特殊船来说,正在生产各种地形都能驾驶的,全天候风力船。

最近在产业现场,日常生活中,频繁发生的各种事故或灾难中,能够安全的 保护生命为您做各种体验及训练的各种安全体验设施，设计制作、制作、安装, 我们正在建立和运营专门经营的公司，作为子公司。

Sunjin Corporation is an engineering company which has its headquarters in Seosan Techno Valley in Seongyeon-myeon, Seosan City and a branch in Haemi-myeon, Seosan City.

Our business focuses mainly on plants and air.

As for plants, we manufacture concrete products such as PHC files, electro-forming, and hume piping. We also design, manufacture, install, and operate various kinds of machinery.

As for air, we design and manufacture aircrafts such as 2-seater lightweight helicopters and unmanned helicopters and special vessels such as all-weather all-land air boats.

Meanwhile, we also established a subsidiary called Sunjin D-tech Co., Ltd. which specializes in designing, manufacturing, installing, and operating various kinds of safety experience facilities for ordinary time training to protect life from all kinds of accidents and disasters that occur frequently in industrial sites and daily life these days.

 

产品：

1，2人用乘人机, 无人机等：可提供147马力的强大动力的最强2人乘直升机，最大起飞重量为680kg, 空机重量为430kg，运载重量高达250kg。除用于休闲活动和喷洒农药外，还可作为无人机使用，用途十分广泛。拥有最佳的性能和安全性，价格实惠，必将能满足客户的需求。

The best-in-class two-seater helicopter boasting of powerful 147 horsepower.

Weighing 430kg empty with max taking-off weight 680kg, the vehicle can load up to as much as 250kg.Various usages such as leisure, crop-dusting, and a drone.

2，风力船Airboat：先进精密,资质技术开发,风力船，水面, 冰面, 沼泽等自由行驶。

多样化 用途 – 旅游用,人员救援用, 工作用, 营业用, 军事用等

The airboat has a unique shape with a flat base and with a propeller in the upper part instead of a screw in the lower part.

With no protruding part at the bottom, it can operate not only on water but also on ice, mudflats, water plant areas, and the like even with hurdles such as nets, ropes, trash, or whatever.

Not to mention four-season leisure and sightseeing, the boat has many usages including lifesaving in mud flats, bogs, ice, flooded areas, and the like; inland water/lakefront management in winter or in the event of a flood; collecting and transporting mud flat fish and shellfish; carrying passengers or freight to areas difficult to access; and special work or military operation.

3，设备Plant：精密设备设计, 制作, 设置, 运行  混凝土制品制作用机械设备

PHC FILE, P.C产品, 电线杆, 驼峰管等

* Designing, manufacturing, installing, and operating precision machinery

* Long-time know-how and installation experience and precise production capabilities for Designing and manufacturing various machines and facilities such as PHC files, P.C products, electric poles, and hume piping。

关于我们
